English.title: Smart Detection of Lymphedema
English.about_text: This is the Lymphedema Early Detection System. It is designed to detect early signs of lymphedema using machine learning algorithms.
English.Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Low r: Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Low risk.
Your predicted Lymphedema risk is: Mild.

English.diag_low_risk: Your LymphScore indicates a LOWER RISK OF LYMPHEDEMA. Please continue daily 30-minute large muscle exercises and skin care. Since the risk of lymphedema is lifetime and early detection and intervention can reverse mild lymphedema, it is important for you to monitor your risk of lymphedema monthly. Please monitor your lymphedema status weekly by visiting The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow Smart Detection site.
English.diag_subclinical: Your LymphScore indicates a SUBCLINICAL LYMPHEDEMA. Please continue daily 30-minute large muscle exercises and skin care. Please start The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow (TOLF) Program immediately. Research has shown that practice TOLF Lymphatic Exercises at least twice a day leads to the reverse of mild lymphedema. Since the risk of lymphedema is lifetime and early detection and intervention can reverse subclinical and mild lymphedema, it is important for you to monitor your risk of lymphedema monthly. Please monitor your lymphedema status weekly by visiting The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow Smart Detection site.
English.diag_mild: Your LymphScore indicates MILD LYMPHEDEMA. Please start The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow (TOLF) Program immediately. Research has shown that practice TOLF Lymphatic Exercises at least twice a day leads to the reverse of mild lymphedema. Lymph fluid is accumulated every 3 seconds, it is important for you to practice TOLF lymphatic exercises daily and continue daily 30-minute large muscle exercises and skin care. Please monitor your lymphedema status weekly by visiting The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow Smart Detection site.
English.diag_moderate: Your LymphScore indicates MODERATE LYMPHEDEMA. Please contact your healthcare providers immediately for a referral to lymphedema treatment. Please also start The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow (TOLF) Program immediately. Research has shown that practice TOLF Lymphatic exercises at least twice a day leads to better management of lymphedema. Lymph fluid is accumulated every 3 seconds, it is important for you to practice TOLF lymphatic exercises daily and continue daily 30-minute large muscle exercises and skin care. It is also important for you to monitor your progress of lymphedema management weekly. Please monitor your lymphedema status weekly by visiting The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow Smart Detection site.
English.diag_severe: Your LymphScore indicates SEVERE LYMPHEDEMA. Please contact your healthcare providers immediately for a referral to lymphedema treatment. Please also start The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow (TOLF) Program immediately. Research has shown that practice TOLF Lymphatic exercises at least twice a day leads to better management of lymphedema. Lymph fluid is accumulated every 3 seconds, it is important for you to practice TOLF lymphatic exercises daily and continue daily 30-minute large muscle exercises and skin care as well as prescribed compression therapy. It is also important for you to monitor your progress of lymphedema management weekly. Please monitor your lymphedema status weekly by visiting The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow Smart Detection site.
English.This is your first time detecting Lymphe: This is your first time detecting Lymphedema. Keep on excercising and let us see your progress!
This is your first time detecting Lymphedema. Keep on the good record!
English.Your detection result shows low risk, ke: Your detection result shows low risk, keep on the good record!
English.Your detection result requires further i: Your detection result requires further inspection, please advice the doctors for further help. Keep on excercising and let us see your progress!
English.Your detection result does not change si: Your detection result does not change since the last time. Keep on excercising and let us see your progress!
English.Congratulations! Your detection result i: Congratulations! Your detection result is much better than your last time. Keep on the good record!
Congratulations! Your detection result is better than your last time. Keep on excercising and keep on the good record!
English.recommendation: To finalize the diagnosis, we recommend you to proceed to Visualized Diagnosis (press the bottom left button), to access your detailed lymphedema risk score, the probabilities of lymphedema stage, your diagnosis history and factors influencing lymphedema.
English.Are you sure you want to delete this acc: Are you sure you want to delete this account? This operation can't be reversed.

Please fill in all required fields.

Spanish.diag_low_risk: Su puntaje de LymphScore indica un RIESGO BAJO DE LINFEDEMA. ContinÃºe con los ejercicios diarios de 30 minutos para grandes grupos musculares y el cuidado de la piel. Dado que el riesgo de linfedema es de por vida y la detecciÃ³n e intervenciÃ³n tempranas pueden revertir el linfedema leve, es importante monitorear su riesgo de linfedema mensualmente. Monitoree su estado de linfedema semanalmente visitando el sitio de detecciÃ³n inteligente The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow.
Spanish.diag_subclinical: Su puntaje de LymphScore indica un LINFEDEMA SUBCLÃNICO. ContinÃºe con los ejercicios diarios de 30 minutos para grandes grupos musculares y el cuidado de la piel. Comience de inmediato el programa The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow (TOLF). Las investigaciones han demostrado que practicar los ejercicios linfÃ¡ticos TOLF al menos dos veces al dÃ­a conduce a la reversiÃ³n del linfedema leve. Dado que el riesgo de linfedema es de por vida y la detecciÃ³n e intervenciÃ³n tempranas pueden revertir el linfedema subclÃ­nico y leve, es importante monitorear su riesgo de linfedema mensualmente. Monitoree su estado de linfedema semanalmente visitando el sitio de detecciÃ³n inteligente The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow.
Spanish.diag_mild: Su puntaje de LymphScore indica un LINFEDEMA LEVE. Comience de inmediato el programa The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow (TOLF). Las investigaciones han demostrado que practicar los ejercicios linfÃ¡ticos TOLF al menos dos veces al dÃ­a conduce a la reversiÃ³n del linfedema leve. El lÃ­quido linfÃ¡tico se acumula cada 3 segundos, por lo que es importante practicar los ejercicios linfÃ¡ticos TOLF diariamente y continuar con los ejercicios diarios de 30 minutos para grandes grupos musculares y el cuidado de la piel. Monitoree su estado de linfedema semanalmente visitando el sitio de detecciÃ³n inteligente The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow.
Spanish.diag_moderate: Su puntaje de LymphScore indica un LINFEDEMA MODERADO. ComunÃ­quese con sus proveedores de atenciÃ³n mÃ©dica de inmediato para obtener una derivaciÃ³n para el tratamiento del linfedema. Comience de inmediato el programa The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow (TOLF). Las investigaciones han demostrado que practicar los ejercicios linfÃ¡ticos TOLF al menos dos veces al dÃ­a conduce a un mejor manejo del linfedema. El lÃ­quido linfÃ¡tico se acumula cada 3 segundos, por lo que es importante practicar los ejercicios linfÃ¡ticos TOLF diariamente y continuar con los ejercicios diarios de 30 minutos para grandes grupos musculares y el cuidado de la piel. TambiÃ©n es importante monitorear su progreso en el manejo del linfedema semanalmente. Monitoree su estado de linfedema semanalmente visitando el sitio de detecciÃ³n inteligente The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow.
Spanish.diag_severe: Su puntaje de LymphScore indica un LINFEDEMA SEVERO. ComunÃ­quese con sus proveedores de atenciÃ³n mÃ©dica de inmediato para obtener una derivaciÃ³n para el tratamiento del linfedema. Comience de inmediato el programa The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow (TOLF). Las investigaciones han demostrado que practicar los ejercicios linfÃ¡ticos TOLF al menos dos veces al dÃ­a conduce a un mejor manejo del linfedema. El lÃ­quido linfÃ¡tico se acumula cada 3 segundos, por lo que es importante practicar los ejercicios linfÃ¡ticos TOLF diariamente y continuar con los ejercicios diarios de 30 minutos para grandes grupos musculares, el cuidado de la piel y la terapia de compresiÃ³n prescrita. TambiÃ©n es importante monitorear su progreso en el manejo del linfedema semanalmente. Monitoree su estado de linfedema semanalmente visitando el sitio de detecciÃ³n inteligente The-Optimal-Lymph-Flow.
